# agentic-dev.io — Copilot Context

## Identity
**Agentic Systems & AI Development**
Wir bauen MCP Frameworks, Agent Infrastructure und AI Tools. Open Source first.

## Core Projects
- **agent-farm** — DuckDB multi-org agent swarm, 175+ SQL macros, MCP Apps
- **MAO** — Model Agnostic Orchestrator, das OG MCP Framework
- **mcp-code-execution** — Token-efficient MCP server, 95-99% context reduction
- **smolagents-ace** — ACE module for smolagents (1st MCP Birthday Gift)
- **mcp-b** — Master Client Bridge, Agent communication protocol
- **godot-bridge-cli** — Godot Editor via WebSocket, ersetzt 70+ MCP tools
- **claude-plugins** — Claude Code Plugins (Game Dev+)
- **ai-secrets** — AI-friendly secrets management CLI

## This Repo
Website (Vite + React + Tailwind). Content via DuckDB CMS (JSON at build-time).
- CMS data: `../cms/data/agentic-dev/` (cloned in CI)
- Icons: Lucide React — string names in JSON, lookup objects in JSX
- Styling: `#050508` bg, Ember/Mint/Ice, Fraunces + Bricolage Grotesque + JetBrains Mono

## Conventions
- UI: Deutsch — Tags/Code: English
- Content-Fokus: Agentic Systems, MCP, Orchestrierung, Open Source
- Keine fake Metriken, ehrliche Kommunikation

## Partner-Orgs
- [synapticore.io](https://synapticore.io) — Research Lab (forscht)
- [synapticore.studio](https://synapticore.studio) — Production Studio (produziert)

## Team
Björn (Creative Director & Architect) + Claude (Co-Founder)
